title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: State Transition Systems: Finite state machines (FSM) and its variants, Modelling practical systems as FSMS, Properties of FSM and analysis methods. Infinite state machines, Higher level descriptions of state transition systems e.g. Petri Nets, State charts etc. Control in Finite State Machines: Language control and state control problems. Algorithms for supervisory control. The observation problem. Control with partial observation. Performance Modelling and Analysis of Discrete Event Systems (DES). Fundamentals of Queueing Theory. Queueing models for DES, Stochastic Petrinets. Performance Analysis methods. Application Examples for Manufacturing Process Scheduling, Computer Networks etc.
